feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 8 April 2023
